blogPost.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
blogPost.body: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
blogPost.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform
blogPost.author: Sush

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。

previous.excerpt: It is very simple and minimalist, but it works. This is a widget application that displays actions to be taken right now. Recommended for smartphone addicts. It is a tool for productivity, but I recommend writing down what you need to do right now.
previous.title: Wyd? - An iOS widget to encourage you to do one thing

localize.description: 它非常简单和简约，但它工作。这是一个显示现在要采取的行动的小部件应用程序。推荐给智能手机上瘾者。它是一个生产力的工具，但我建议写下你现在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一个鼓励你做一件事的iOS小工具

localize.description: 它非常簡單和簡約，但它工作。這是一個顯示現在要採取的行動的小部件應用程序。推薦給智能手機上癮者。它是一個生產力的工具，但我建議寫下你現在需要做的事情。
localize.tagline: 一個鼓勵你做一件事的iOS小工具

next.excerpt: Corrily optimizes prices and discounts for subscription and usage-based companies. By copying a few lines of code, you can run experiments to find better prices, localize them to the user, and boost growth and retention.
next.title: Corrily - Price localization and optimization for SaaS companies

localize.description: Corrily为订阅和使用型公司优化价格和折扣。通过复制几行代码，你可以运行实验来寻找更好的价格，将其本地化到用户，并促进增长和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企业的价格本地化和优化

localize.description: Corrily爲訂閱和使用型公司優化價格和折扣。通過複製幾行代碼，你可以運行實驗來尋找更好的價格，將其本地化到用戶，並促進增長和保留。
localize.tagline: SaaS企業的價格本地化和優化
